name: Run (itch) (mode77)
description:
The theme of these GameJam was to enable the player to experience two different worlds. Our interpretation of this topic certainly draws from personal experience of Russias invasion of Ukraine. Therefore our two worlds are war and peace.

We want to show solidarity and tell a story that is rooted in reality

It was created for the FrankenGameJam 2022

Credits:

Art: Bastian Uhmann & Kateryna Kaidashova

Game Design: Yuliia Kaidashova

Programming: Alexander Klingenbeck
